dialogs.responseText: Hello. You're not headed into that swamp, are you?
Well, good luck. I spent all day trying and ended up back at the start over and over. I've heard someone up north made it though, so I might try to find him and see if he can help.
That's smart. It's a waste of time. I spent all day trying and ended up back at the start over and over. I've heard someone up north made it though, so I might try to find him and see if he can help.
